name: Daily Routines and Affirmations
description: Organize your daily schedule with ease using this functional Notion template. The template includes four sections for your Morning, Afternoon, Evening, and Bedtime Routines, allowing you to structure your day efficiently. In addition to planning your routine, you can also boost your mood and motivation by adding daily affirmations to your schedule. The user-friendly drag-and-drop affirmation board is included, making it simple to customize your daily affirmations to fit your needs. Stay on top o
